value.name: CDC advises masks not necessary when fully COVID-19 vaccinated; Nevada adopts guidance
value.description: : Nevada will be following the latest recommendations on masking from the CDC, according to a tweet from Gov. Steve Sisolak. *** The U.S. Centers for Disease Control announced on its website Thursday that it is recommending that those who are fully vaccinated can resume regular activities prior to the COVID-19 pandemic without having to wear a mask.

value.name: Virginia Truckee Railroad opens its 2021 season Memorial Day weekend
value.description: The Virginia Truckee Railroad begins its 46th season on Friday, May 28, 2021. Powered by a heritage diesel locomotive, the Virginia Truckee Railroad will be running roundtrips from Virginia City to Gold Hill on Saturday,
